lines.text: It's a curious name for a man... Evelyn.

[to Sally]
You must think I'm either an angel or a fool. I'm neither.
I wonder how many crimes are committed in the name of duty.
Do you suppose death is beautiful, Peter?
Only if life is ugly, sir.

[to Dr. Odell]
You know, doctor, a man shows his character by the way he handles a sword.

[to Boulton]
I may be wrong about you, Major Boulton, but I don't think so. I think you're playing a very unorthodox game.
